comments:
Description:
  When set a cascadding parameter to the joint dataset,an error is thrown out

Steps to reproduce:
  1. new a report
  2. new a joint data set, and set a cascadding parameter to the dataset


Actual result:
   an error is thrown out:

Model has revised code. Still need Engine's support to get rid of NPE.

Since CascadingParameterGroupHandle.getDataSet() may return a JointDataSetHandle, which is different from ODADatasetHandle & ScriptDataSetHandle, getting some properties on JointDataSetHandle may return null.
